title: The Butterfly Life Cycle
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 233 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 480L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     K and N
description: A monarch butterfly changes from egg to caterpillar, then to pupa, and finally to butterfly in The Butterfly Life Cycle. Vivid photographs illustrate this process. The book can also be used to teach students how to sequence events in a text and how to apply subject-verb agreement. The book and lesson are also available for levels K and N.
meta: butterfly, caterpillar, life cycle, mate, pupa, stages
Sequence Events : Sequence events in a text
Long Vowel Sounds : Discriminate medial long vowel /i/ sound
Subject-Verb Agreement : Understand and apply subject-verb agreement
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use the high-frequency word eats
